We specialise in the design, project management and construction of gas, water, electricity and telecoms networks, covering the complete spectrum of infrastructure engineering services for all types of development.

We are fully accredited under the Lloyd’s Register Scheme and hold full design and construction accreditations for gas (GIRS), water (WIRS) and electricity (NERS).

We’re very good at what we do, have a strong balance sheet and enjoy long-standing client relationships through an absolute focus on their needs.  For us, performance is everything.

We provide a number of specialised services:

 

  • Electricity, gas and water network design and construction
  • Project Management
  • Multi Utility Construction
  • High Voltage/Low Voltage networks
  • Utility Diversions
  • Utility cost advice and regulatory advice
  • Wayleaves and Easement Contracts
  • Metering Engineering Services
  • Renewable/Alternative Energies
  • Combined Heat and Power
  • Metering and Supply Contracts
  • Street lighting – design and installation
  • Street lighting cable jointing

There’s a large, committed and expert team at your disposal. If we can help, we will. If we can’t, we’ll say so – and point you to someone who can.

 

Practical, no-nonsense support, wherever you need it.
